Title: Relates to the use of electronic monitoring devices to monitor residents in assisted living residences and patients in nursing homes
Summary: Relates to the use of electronic monitoring devices to monitor residents in assisted living residences and patients in nursing homes; requires consent from roommates to such electronic monitoring.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the use of electronic monitoring devices in the rooms of residents in assisted living residences and patients in nursing homes
